sourcesContent:
<template>
  <biz-form
    @rest-use-shop="onRestUseShop"
    @submit-form="onSubmit"
    @use-shop="onUseShop"
    @up="onSaveAndUp"
  >
    <template slot="range">
      <st-form-item label="总节数" labelWidth="118px" required>
        <a-radio-group
          v-model="isLimit"
          @change="onIsLimit"
          :options="isLimitOptions$"
        ></a-radio-group>
      </st-form-item>
    </template>
    <template slot="courseRange">
      <add-course-range-table
        v-if="isRestCourseRange"
        :useShopInfo="useShopInfo"
        :isLimit="!!isLimit"
        @change="onCourseRange"
      ></add-course-range-table>
    </template>
  </biz-form>
</template>

<script>
import BizForm from './component#/form'
import AddCourseRangeTable from './component#/add-course-range-table'
import { AddRangePackageService } from './add-range-package.service'
export default {
  name: 'AddRangePackage',
  components: {
    BizForm,
    AddCourseRangeTable
  },
  serviceInject() {
    return {
      service: AddRangePackageService
    }
  },
  rxState() {
    const { isLimitOptions$ } = this.service
    return {
      isLimitOptions$
    }
  },
  data() {
    return {
      isLimit: 1,
      rangeCourse: {},
      useShopInfo: {},
      isRestCourseRange: true
    }
  },
  methods: {
    onRestUseShop() {
      this.isRestCourseRange = false
      let timer = setTimeout(() => {
        this.isRestCourseRange = true
        clearTimeout(timer)
      })
    },
    onUseShop(useShopInfo) {
      this.useShopInfo = useShopInfo
    },
    onCourseRange(rangeCourse) {
      this.rangeCourse = { ...rangeCourse }
    },
    onIsLimit(event) {
      console.log(this.isLimit)
    },
    onSubmit(form) {
      this.service
        .add({ is_limit: this.isLimit, ...this.rangeCourse, ...form })
        .subscribe(res => {
          this.$router.push({
            name: 'brand-product-package-list'
          })
        })
    },
    onSaveAndUp(form) {
      this.service
        .addAndUp({ is_limit: this.isLimit, ...this.rangeCourse, ...form })
        .subscribe(res => {
          this.$router.push({
            name: 'brand-product-package-list'
          })
        })
    }
  }
}
</script>
